name: Tom Holden
descriptions: Tom Holden is a resident of Vault 101 in Fallout 3.
In the chaos of the Lone Wanderer's escape from Vault 101, Tom Holden wishes to flee the Vault alongside his wife Mary, although she would prefer that they simply return to their quarters.

However, if the Lone Wanderer manages to reach the guards before Tom does, neither Tom nor Mary will be killed, and instead will flee together into a separate hallway. Even if they do survive, they disappear from the game, and do not appear in Trouble on the Homefront.
